com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure.StructureObject
      • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure.Util

  • public class Util
extends StructureObject
    The Engine's Utility Class

    Hold a variety of utility methods that don't have a place within an object.

    Author:
    Spartak

      static class  Util.Color 
      class  Util.NullColorException
      Thrown if an object is being drawn that has not had its color value initialized.
